prod_short_desc: Dive into battle against Doomsday™ with Wonder Woman™!
prod_long_desc:
Stage a face-off between Wonder Woman™ and Doomsday™ in this fun Mighty Micros play set. Dodge Doomsday’s club by driving—or flying—Wonder Woman’s Invisible Jet, then retaliate with her sword. Includes two minifigures with mini legs.
Includes two minifigures with mini legs: Wonder Woman™ and Doomsday™.
Wonder Woman’s Mighty Micros jet features translucent elements.
Doomsday’s Mighty Micros car features translucent flame elements.
Help Wonder Woman™ make her escape by flying off in her Mighty Micros jet!
Weapons include Wonder Woman’s sword and shield, plus Doomsday’s club.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Wonder Woman’s Mighty Micros jet measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
Doomsday’s Mighty Micros car measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
set: Mighty Micros: Wonder Woman™ vs. Doomsday™
